snippet: In the Socrates Sculpture Park in Long Island City, Queens, a 10-foot-high inflatable Buddha sculpture prompts visitors to reflect — and post photos to Twitter.
abstract: Ten-foot-high inflatable Buddha sculpture in Socrates Sculpture Park in Long Island City, Queens, draws many visitors to the park; the floating Buddha seems to bring personal delight to many people, religious or not; sculpture, by New York City artist Chang-Jin Lee, is part of an exhibition of emerging artists.
lead_paragraph: In the Socrates Sculpture Park in Long Island City, Queens, a 10-foot-high inflatable Buddha sculpture prompts visitors to reflect — and post photos to Twitter.

headline.seo: Buddha Sculpture Invites Reflection, and Instagram Photos
headline.main: A Buddha, Full of Air, Sits Serenely on the Waves
